dataset.name: ds1
dataset.sql: select t.id,t.name,nvl(t.collect_count,0) as collect_count,nvl(t.watch_count,0) as watch_count, vc.create_time,vc.user_id,vci.if_shelves,nvl(vci.serial_number,10000000) as serial_number,vci.cover from vms_collect vc, vms_cast_info vci,v_vms_video_countprop t where vc.video_id = vci.id and vci.id = t.id and vci.if_shelves='1' and vci.if_del='1' and vc.user_id='$user.id$' order by vc.create_time desc
